jobInfo.postDescription:
该职位base 武汉或天津博格华纳；
General Description
职位描述
The [Electric Machine Analyst] will be responsible for the design, analysis, and optimization of electric machines used in automotive applications. This role involves working closely with cross-functional teams to ensure that the electric machine designs meet performance, efficiency, noise and reliability standards.
该职位将负责汽车应用中电机的设计、分析和优化。该职位需要与跨职能团队紧密合作，确保电机设计符合性能、效率、噪音和可靠性标准。
Key Accountabilities 
岗位职责
61	Design and Development:
设计和开发
o	Develop and optimize electric machine designs for automotive applications.
开发和优化车用电机设计。
o	Conduct electromagnetic, thermal, and mechanical analyses to ensure performance and reliability.
进行电磁、热和机械分析，以确保性能和可靠性
o	Collaborate with design and project engineers to ensure that designs will integrate into vehicle systems.
与设计和项目工程师合作，确保设计与车辆系统相结合。
61	Simulation and Modelling:
模拟和建模
o	Utilize simulation tools to model electric machine performance.  
利用仿真工具对电机性能进行建模。
o	Conduct finite element analysis (FEA) simulations.  Process the results of these simulations, draw conclusions and communicate these through the organization.
进行有限元分析(FEA)模拟。处理模拟结果，得出结论。
o	Develop and improve simulation models to predict machine behavior under various operating conditions.  
开发和改进模拟模型，以预测机器在不同操作条件下的行为。
61	Continuous Improvement:
持续改进
o	Monitor the latest advancements in electric machine technology, updating skills when required.
持续关注电机技术的最新进展，在需要时更新技能。
o	Identify opportunities for electric machine innovation, efficiency improvements, design cost reduction.
识别电机创新，提高效率，降低设计成本的机会。
o	Engage with Test and Systems engineers to improve the alignment of simulations with test data.
与测试和系统工程师合作，改进模拟与测试数据的一致性。
o	Participate in design reviews and provide technical expertise.
参与设计评审并提供技术建议。
Qualifications & Requirements
任职资格与要求
o	Bachelor’s degree in electrical engineering, preferably with a focus on Electric Machine Design.
电气工程学士学位，电机设计专业优先。
o	3+ years of experience in electric machine design and analysis, preferably in the automotive industry.
3年以上电机设计和分析经验，有汽车行业经验者优先。
o	Proficiency in simulation tools including electromagnetic FEA, Matlab and Simulink.  Familiarity with Ansys Maxwell and Motor-CAD is preferred.
熟练使用电磁FEA、Matlab、Simulink等仿真工具。熟悉Ansys Maxwell和Motor-CAD优先。
o	Deep and broad knowledge and understanding of electric machines.  Experience of designing automotive traction machines is preferred.
对电机有深刻而广泛的知识和理解。有汽车牵引机设计经验者优先。
o	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
较强的分析和解决问题的能力。
o	Good communication and teamwork abilities.
良好的沟通和团队合作能力。
o	Business proficiency in English language.
英文流利者优先。
jobInfo.address: 武汉蔡甸区博格华纳汽车零部件(武汉)有限公司博格华纳

brandComInfo.introduce: 博格华纳公司是致力于提供创新可持续车行方案的供应商，旨在定义移动出行的全新模式公司在63个地区拥有制造地点，在全球拥有38,000名员工，88%的收入来自于清洁和减排产品。我们与全球优秀的技术专家、工程师和汽车制造商一起蓄势前行，共同加速发展电动出行时代以共创一个洁净、节能的世界。
